Name: DailyHeartlandsNews/SkyKingdomRelics
Body: Excavations in Chrysadia's ruins have uncovered intact Aerialite armor sets, confirming their link to the sky kingdom's royal guard. The helmets bear engravings of a winged serpentâ€”likely an early depiction of Yharon. Most intriguing is a shattered greatsword embedded with celestial ore, still humming with energy. Researchers warn handling it causes 'temporal disorientation' and visions of 'a city falling upward.'
